short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan webpages to find buzzwords and make your writing more unique with BuzzCut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BuzzCut can help you determine how much waffle a page contains, and eliminate buzzwords and meaningless cliches from your writing.

Simply scan a webpage to get a score and full report on how many buzzwords appear on the page, or use the web app to check your blogs and social posts for mediocre phrases.
